entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Grid Tap Gestures aren't limited to the cells they are assigned to #21740
  • Improve information/experience around x:DataType behaviour in Debug vs Release #21735
  • Silent workload updates break builds #21734
  • Review / Rename any Xamarin branding #21732
    .NET 8 SR5
  • Entry Text changing to black on slider change when is light mode iOS #21731
  • Firebase Messaging (FCM) is not working in Maui net8.0 #21730
  • [iOS] Collectionview itemslayout styling changes with footer #21728
  • MAUI CI build hangs when running on ARM Apple M machines #21727
  • [IOS] KeyboardAutoScrollManager NullReferenceException when focussing Editor/Entry in modal bottom sheet #21726
  • [iOS] Button FontFamily not working together with CharacterSpacing #21722
  • CollectionView with AdaptiveTrigger not rendered properly #21719
  • Android: Entry.VerticalTextAlignment ignored if layouted in Grid row with fix height #21717

Closed

  • Compatibility HorizontalStackLayout does not constrain correctly #12415
    Backlog
  • Compatibility elements don't work as expected #15454
    Backlog
  • [Hot Reload] Hot reload currently fails if you have service scope validation enabled #21081
    .NET 8 SR4
  • Cascading memory leak when StrokeShape is set via a global style on Border control #20163
    Backlog
  • Cascading memory leak when StrokeShape is set on Border control on iOS #20121
    .NET 8 SR5
  • Windows Unpackaged support in .NET MAUI #10564
    Backlog
  • [testing] xharness can't boot and install app on 14.5 simulators with macOS Sonoma #18989
    Backlog
  • [testing] TestTemplates RuniOS fails a lot on iOS #21077
    Backlog
  • [Testing] Template tests xharness issues #20623
    Backlog
  • Unable to deploy maui app on ios #19671
  • Unexpected DataTrigger Behaviour on Android #21004
  • LinearGradientBrush in global style does not work #20097
  • Hybrid (MAUI Blazor) app crashes on iOS 17.4 #21707

PullRequests

Created

  • Init the flex item before adding it to the layout #21737
  • [iOS] CollectionView item sizing wrong after refresh #21736
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Clamp images inside buttons to button width/height #21733
  • Binding source generator #21725
  • [Testing] Update Appium to RC7 #21720
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 8 SR4
  • [iOS] Fix crash closing Popup with WebView #21718
    t/bug, area/navigation 🧭, area/controls 🎮, control-webview

Merged

  • Add 8.0.20 to bug template #21739
  • Make sure to await async test asserts (2) #20506
    area/testing, community ✨
  • Update GitInfo.txt to 8.0.21-preview #21729
  • [Trimming] Remove unnecessary regular expressions #21497
    area/app-size 🤏
  • [net9.0] [testing] Enable Windows UITests back (#20727) and make sure Android works too #21636
    area/testing
  • [Catalyst] Add default FilePickerFileTypes #21689
  • [android] improve FormattedString performance #21712
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️, area/controls 🎮, control-label

Updated

  • Allow PathFigureCollection to string conversion via converter #19889
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • [ci] Move to arcade , remove GitInfo #21487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Light up HideSoftInputOnTappedChanged for catalyst #21529
  • [Trimming] Enable trimming and AOT analyzers #21505
  • [Trimming] Use new feature switch definition attribute and enable analyzers in Controls.Core.csproj #21621
  • Clarify PlatformImage supported image formats docs #21697
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, t/docs 📝
  • [Catalyst,Windows] Allow drag item from outside the app #21684
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Avoid hang or crash loading CollectionView with thousands of elements #21422
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Android] Fix CarouselView behavior with device orientation changes #21635
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Testing] Rework Appium Runner so that it goes directly to tests instead of navigates #20700
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Setup scaffolding for legacy test runner #21423
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Document NavigableElement #21507
    area/navigation 🧭
  • Update NavigatedFromEventArgs.cs #21658
    area/navigation 🧭, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • [Android] Flyout IsGestureEnabled fix #21686
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, control-flyout
  • [iOS] FlyoutHeader size change fix #21692
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, control-flyout
  • [Android] Removing TapGestureRecognizer with at least 2 taps causes Exception - fix #21714
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/gestures
  • Add an API to allow registering TypeConverters for third-party types #21476
  • [Android] Navigation icon blink fix - shell (#18867) #21455
    area/navigation 🧭, area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
